pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Analysis and Programming // The Hypothesis tests for the means of independent or paired groups. This package investigates the normality assumption automatically. Then, it tests the hypothesis tests for two independent or paired group means by using parametric or non-parametric tests. It uses the Shapiro-Wilk test to test the normality assumption. For independent two groups, If data comes from the normal distribution, the package uses the Z or t-test according to whether variances are known. For paired groups, it uses paired t-test under normal data sets. If data does not come from the normal distribution, the package uses the Wilcoxon test for independent and paired cases.
